name: 4th Edition of International Vaccines Congress
content: After the huge success of past editions, Magnus group has taken the action in bringing together world-class experts from different countries, universities, laboratories and industry on a single forum at “4th Edition of International Vaccines Congress” (IVC 2024) at Baltimore, MD, USA slated during October 24-26, 2024\. IVC 2024 expects a global audience of delegates, including eminent speakers, academicians, researchers, students, and Laboratory professionals, to take part on a international forum to discuss their latest research ideas in the fields of Vaccine. The conference will be organized around the theme Assembling Trivial Keys in Vaccine. We hope that it will provide a highly interactive platform for relevant experts from the academic and industrial areas to exchange education and research face to face. Upcoming vaccine Conferences, Vaccine Research Conferences 2024, Vaccines Conference, Vaccine Conference 2024, Vaccines Congress, Vaccines 2024, Vaccine Immunology Congress 2024, Protein Based Vaccines Conferences, Childhood Infection Vaccines Conferences 2024, Bacterial Diseases conferences 2024, Vaccines for Vector-borne Diseases Conference, Top Vaccines Events Scientific sessions: Next-Generation Vaccine Delivery Technologies Vaccines Policy and Regulatory Affairs Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) For more scientific session, please visit: https://vaccinescongress.com/program/scientific-sessions
